poem:
### Currents of Betrayal

Against the spindle of power  
turns the wheel of greed;  
unnatural fissures crack  
beneath the glow of spent fuel.  
Invisible hands twist shadows  
upon the energy of a nation,  
as silent rivers of corruption  
nourish fields  
where crops of hope  
wilt unused,  
under the omnipresent  
sky of revolution.
